content: The Release and Reclaim Religious Recovery Group is a private, online support group that aims to help members release old, toxic beliefs and reclaim their lives. The group is led by Dr. Marlene Winell, a psychologist, religious recovery consultant, and writer in Western Massachusetts, who has 30 years of experience in human services. Group facilitators are also helping professionals with a range of experience and expertise in supporting individuals recovering from religious trauma. Participants in the group come from a variety of backgrounds, including Christian fundamentalism, Pentecostalism, Islamic faith, Catholicism, Mormonism, and many others. The group offers confidential support, discussion, and twice-monthly Zoom conference calls. Members have shared positive experiences with the group, noting the sense of community and understanding they have found among others who have also been affected by religious trauma.
